actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify the local furnishing rule with respect to the tax-exempt status of interest on obligations issued to provide facilities for the local furnishing of gas.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to specify that interest on certain industrial development bonds may be excluded from gross income if such bonds are used for the local furnishing of gas (previously just electric) energy.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify the local furnishing rule with respect to the tax-exempt status of interest on obligations issued to provide facilities for the local furnishing of gas.
